regular-grammar.head-re: ((?<thread>[\da-fA-F]+)\:\ )? # there might be thread id (\< ( (?<year4d>\d{4}) # 4-digit year |(?<year2d>\ \d|\d{2}) # or 2-digit year ) (?<date>\/\d{2}\/\d{2}\ \d{2}\:\d{2}\:\d{2}) # the rest of date \>\ )

format.description: Logs that are created with macros from old version of trace.h/trace.cpp file.
